div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 277 Keratea, Attica, 1954 Burial: c. 140-130 B.C. (T) Contents: 131 AE. Pot hoard Athens: 103 New Style (as Svoronos pl. 22, 53-8 [13]; pl. 81 [68]; pl. 24, 62 ff. [22]) 1 "Eleusinian" type (as Sv. pl. 103, 50-6 27 "Delian" types (as Sv. pl. 107, 50-4 [25]; 75 ff. [1]; pl. 106, 1-7 [1]) Disposition: New York Thompson, Athens, pp. 526 ff.
